title: Secure, audited, and regulated
subtitle: Peace of mind for your investment
description-1: To ensure maximum safety, security and transparency, Gold DAO’s gold assets are audited every four months by KPMG, which issues an independent audit report verifying that the physical gold bullion is present and securely stored. These audit reports can be viewed at <0>https://yumi.io/gold/audit</0>.
description-2: All gold assets are sourced from <0>Metalor®</0>, one of the world's most trusted gold refiners, and securely stored in high-security Swiss vaults provided by Loomis, giving you peace of mind that your investment is fully protected.
